duties_responsibilities.duty: Train and develop a team of Guides to implement the Alpha system with world-class excellence.
Create Guide Playbooks that detail best practices for facilitation, instructions on how to design more rewarding learning activities, and what to do when challenges arise.
Lead a small cohort of students, using kid-expertise and coaching skills to turn even the most reticent learner into a high performer.
Regularly provide personal, actionable feedback to the team of Alpha Guides to improve their daily performance.
